content: **as one of the featured hat in the crochet cancer challenge 2024 learn how to download a free copy between october 19-22 2024 by visiting sweet potato 3 1 ** *make sure to only copy the letters and numbers for the coupon code to use for the password the peachy purpose bucket hat is meant to raise awareness about endometrial cancer within the uterus and often is not detected until other medical conditions have been diagnosed in creating something that is meant to be gifted to a cancer patient or survivor such a person deserves to look good on days in which they may not feel good so an on trend bucket with gentle ruffles is sure to bring a smile introducing the reversible embossed wedge bucket hat a stylish and meaningful crochet project this bucket hat is not only fun to make but also carries a powerful message featuring the unique embossed wedge stitch it combines two colors with purpose peach to represent endometrial cancer awareness and white for all cancers with three versatile sizes it s perfect for kids teens and adults whether you re creating it for yourself or as a gift this hat brings together fashion and a heartfelt cause make it your own and wear it with pride on both sides join confidently crochet with creations by courtney on facebook https //https //www facebook com/groups/creationsbycourt sizes child crown 5 75 \ 15 cm\ diameter teen crown 6 25 \ 16 cm\ diameter adult crown 7 \ 18 cm\ diameter 2024 creations by courtney this pattern is not to be duplicated or resold and not to be reproduced commercially you may sell finished products on etsy at farmers markets and craft fairs but please credit creations by courtney as the pattern s author 1 https //sweetpotato3 com/join-the-2024-crochet-cancer-challenge/
